abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Metropolitan Museum of Art exhibitions Fatal Attraction: Piotr Uklanski Photographs and Fatal Attraction: Piotr Uklanski Selects From the Met Collection.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Uklanski’s efforts — both artistic and curatorial — can be seen in the decorous precincts of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Fatal Attraction,’ Piotr Uklanski’s Unblinking Gaze
headline.print_headline: Viewing the World at Full Exposure

snippet: Mr. Uklanski’s efforts — both artistic and curatorial — can be seen in the decorous precincts of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
